snippet: In his remarks, Aubrey K. Mr. McClendon expressed no remorse for revelations about his financial dealings except for the distraction of the publicity.
abstract: Chesapeake Energy chief executive Aubrey K McClendon expresses no remorse for revelations about his financial dealings except for the distraction of the publicity; declines to speak about mounting assertions of conflicts of interest involving her personal finances and those of the company.
lead_paragraph: In his remarks, Aubrey K. Mr. McClendon expressed no remorse for revelations about his financial dealings except for the distraction of the publicity.

headline.print_headline: Energy Chief Responds To Reports Of His Deals
